Name: customer_id
Description: Customer id. Optionally you can call the method without providing customer id but you MUST provide a valid authentication token.

Name: email
Description: A valid email address is required in order to create a new account

Name: group_id
Description: Group id for texts (alphanumeric string, recommended max length 32 characters). If provided, all text ids in group are visible only in the group (e.g. text ids won't collide between groups).

Name: invalidate_translations [=1]
Description: A boolean value (1/0;on/off) which controls if translations are trashed or not. E.g. if you make a spelling error correction to the original text, you probably don't want to trash the translations and re-translate the text. Also if you save previously made translation to our system using this method, it's really important to set invalidate_translations off!

Name: is_draft
Description: A boolean value (1/0;on/off) which controls if translations is a draft or not. Draft translations are checked by a translator when translation request is placed

Name: language
Description: Language id (int). The human language text provided is written in. E.g. 1 = English (GB), 11 = Finnish. Please refer to /languages/-method for full list of language ids.

Name: notify [=1]
Description: Send account password and welcome email to the customer via email

Name: terms
Description: Has customer accepted Terms of Service? If so, only valid value is "ok"

Name: text
Description: either source text to translate or previously made translation you want to save into our system. May contain HTML or any other markup.

Name: text_id
Description: Text id (alphanumeric string, recommended max length 64 characters). If group id is provided, text id is visible only in the group (e.g. text ids won't collide between groups).

Name: token
Description: Authentication token which can be acquired with valid transfluent.com account credentials using authenticate-method For details, please see:- Authenticate
